title: Nutanix announces AI partner program, GPT-in-a-Box 2.0
author: Paul Krill
description: GPT-in-a-Box is a full-stack platform for running generative AI workloads that integrates Nvidia NIMs and the Hugging Face LLM library.
cntitle: Nutanix 宣布推出 AI 合作伙伴计划 GPT-in-a-Box 2.0
cndescription: GPT-in-a-Box 是一个全栈平台，用于运行生成式 AI 工作负载，它集成了 Nvidia NIM 和 Hugging Face LLM 库。
